nodes.text: Jary Bowman was a male lieutenant aboard the cargo starship Legacy Run, serving as the vessel's first officer under Captain Hedda Casset. Bowman was left in command of the bridge during the starship's final voyage when Captain Casset took a break to do her rounds, and turned over the watch back to her when she returned. When the Legacy Run was destroyed in hyperspace, which began the Great Hyperspace Disaster, he perished along with Captain Casset, with his last actions being to salute his captain.
